This game was worth the buy, it is really fun, it's unique and there are many ways to complete chambers so it has a HUGE replay value, it also has a vey good story.

Buy it. 10/10 I'll play it again many, many times.

Portal Speedunner Here.

Best game ever

Game is cool, there's no doubt about that. I don't have any nostalgic bias for this game, but I still found it very enjoyable, even if it does get a little repetitive after a while. The story is also fun and interesting, especially the secret hideouts from the former tester. This was my first PC game besides TF2, (as I am a young rapscallion) and in my opinion is a great starter game for PC gaming. I appreciate how  they took such a basic idea and made such an interesting thing. Only critiques is that one, like said before, it is a bit repetitive, and two, the final boss fight is a little too simple and easy for a game as complex as Portal. Also, the song that comes out of the radio is funky. 8.5/10

Portal es una saga con una idea increiblemente innovadora y genial. Somos un sujeto de pruebas en una especie de laboratorio abandonado (con un trasfondo misterioso) y nos vamos adentrando en todo tipo de mapas y desafios. Nuestra unica arma son los portales. Al principio parece entretenido pero pronto vamos a descubrir una terrible verdad. En ese sentido el juego supo crear una atmosfera muy especial. Un juego inolvidable, entretenido y muy recomendable.
Jogo tão bom que o meu nickname nos lugares se tornou CakeLies
Welp, I don't know how it took me 10+ years to actually getting around to playing this. What can I say that already hasn't been said? It's a genre-defining classic.

Bellissimo gioco, lo gioco per la prima volta nel 2020 e devo dire: non male! 
Una volta finita la storia (bellissima e con un plot-twist davvero inaspettato), il gioco continua con le sfide a tempo oppure i livelli avanzati, e anche livelli creati dalla community. Al tempo della recensione ho giocato 3 ore ma mi aspetto che crescano prossimamente.
Un classique qui n'a que très peu vieilli : concept, puzzles, graphismes et ambiance toujours ultra-plaisants.

Que jogo fantástico, fico imaginando o quão inovador isso foi pra época, pois ele não é somente um jogo de Puzzles, ele tem uma história bem divertida, que faz com que em poucos minutos tu crie um carinho pela GLaDOS que é simplesmente uma personagem muito bem feita. Eu gosto de jogos de Puzzles, porém nunca foram meu foco, agora por conta de Portal, eu tenho uma imensa curiosidade dos jogos Puzzles que vieram logo em sequência, principalmente aqueles que foram influenciados (acredito que todos). Gosto como esse jogo não te subestima e te recompensa com uma fala incrível da GLaDOS e com a satisfação de ter completado um puzzle. 
Fácil entrou para um dos meus jogos favoritos, mal posso esperar para jogar a sua sequência. <3

There's not much to say about Portal that hasn't already been said. It's a great puzzle game with influential mechanics, wonderful character designs, and many many Easter eggs that enhance the suspenseful atmosphere. I would definitely recommend this to everyone I know, except they've all already played it. A classic worthy of the title, if you haven't completed this gem yet I would definitely move it to the top of your list.

A ideia de usar portais como o ponto principal do jogo foi simplesmente de explodir a mente, simplesmente genial. As mecânicas e físicas do jogo são sensacionais, foram muito boas as minhas experiências.

O enredo é sobre Chell uma mulher que acorda nos laboratórios Aperture e logo depois instruída por uma Inteligencia Artificial chamada Glados a utilizar a Portal Gun para concluir uma série de testes, e como recompensa ganhar um bolo no final.

Ayuda me quiero culiar un robot

Не, ну так игра норм. Но смахивает на поделку, сделанную школьниками 9 класса на коленке. Если вы не "Valve'ер", и впервые знакомитесь со стимом и т. д. То для начала берите Portal ( Если есть скидка, берите Bundle из двух частей, не пожалеете). Не знаю но мне кажется это самым правильным. Ах да, плюсы... 
Сюжет: нормально, но для ТеОрИй маловато. 
Физика: самая реалестичная игра про порталы и про то, как надо сп**дить торт у робота. 
Атомомфера: всю игру будешь чувствовать напряжение.
А теперь минусы. 
Геймплей: ну что это такое? Когда вы начнете игру, вы и моргнуть не успеете, а она уже закончится. 
Всё вроде. 
Итог: 8.9/10 2-часть лучше!

This game is really small and quick to finish. The graphics are great when it comes to the fact this game was made almost 14 years ago, and the storyline is amazing. I like the second one better only because there's more to be done, it's much longer with a co-op too. I recommend this game :D
КРУТО!!!

Never once touched a mouse and keyboard in my life in terms of gaming, and Portal was an excellent game to start learning. I want to be able to play some FPS in the future, but I didn't want the sentiment of stress and urgency that is pushed onto you when playing a FPS game (as in you either kill or be killed). In Portal I could (somewhat) take my time to aim and move around which is great if you're learning.

In terms of the game itself, I loved it! For a game that came out in 2007, it aged very well. The gameplay is nice, story is nice, but I wish the lenght of the game was longer.  On that note, I'm going to buy Portal 2. :)
